name: Mzito
storyline: "The Lions are asleep. They have been asleep for too long. The Spirits of Africa sought an end to this darkness, thus, they sacrificed a piece of themselves and created the first two Mzito. Mzito is a 2D faller platformer adventure game.You play as one of the first two Mzito and go on an epic adventure to save Africa across 15 majestic locations. It is your duty to purge the ancient corruption and begin the new awakening."
